templates.name: Prerequisites for $concept
templates.cypher: MATCH path=(r:Concept)-[:PREREQUISITE_OF*]->(t:Concept) WHERE t.name CONTAINS $concept RETURN path LIMIT 100

templates.name: Show $subject $key_stage
templates.cypher: MATCH (p:Programme) WHERE p.subject_name=$subject AND p.key_stage=$key_stage MATCH path=(p)-[*1..3]->() RETURN path LIMIT 200

templates.name: Show $layer layer
templates.cypher: MATCH (n) WHERE n.display_category=$layer RETURN n LIMIT 300

templates.name: What does $topic teach
templates.cypher: MATCH (t:Topic)-[:TEACHES]->(c:Concept) WHERE t.topic_name CONTAINS $topic RETURN t, c LIMIT 100

templates.name: NGSS vs UK science
templates.cypher: MATCH (p:Practice) OPTIONAL MATCH (p)-[:ALIGNS_TO]->(c:Concept) RETURN p, c LIMIT 100

templates.name: Concepts assessed in KS2
templates.cypher: MATCH (cdc:ContentDomainCode)-[:ASSESSES_CONCEPT]->(c:Concept) RETURN cdc, c LIMIT 200

templates.name: Year group profile $year
templates.cypher: MATCH (y:Year {name:$year}) RETURN y

templates.name: KS1 learning journey
templates.cypher: MATCH (ks:KeyStage)-[:HAS_YEAR]->(y:Year) WHERE ks.name='KS1' MATCH path=(y)-[:HAS_PROGRAMME]->(p)-[*1..3]->() RETURN path LIMIT 200

templates.name: Lesson context for $year $subject
templates.cypher:
MATCH (y:Year {year_id:$year})
MATCH (y)-[:HAS_CONTENT_GUIDELINE]->(cg)
MATCH (y)-[:HAS_PEDAGOGY_PROFILE]->(pp)
MATCH (y)-[:HAS_FEEDBACK_PROFILE]->(fp)
OPTIONAL MATCH (y)-[:SUPPORTS_INTERACTION {primary:true}]->(it)
RETURN y, cg, pp, fp, collect(it) AS interactions

templates.name: Primary interactions for $year
templates.cypher:
MATCH (y:Year {year_id:$year})-[:SUPPORTS_INTERACTION {primary:true}]->(i:InteractionType)
RETURN y, i

templates.name: Interactions by category $category
templates.cypher:
MATCH (y:Year)-[:SUPPORTS_INTERACTION]->(i:InteractionType {category:$category})
RETURN y, i

templates.name: Years requiring TTS
templates.cypher:
MATCH (y:Year)-[:HAS_CONTENT_GUIDELINE]->(cg:ContentGuideline {tts_required:true})
RETURN y, cg

templates.name: Teaching clusters for $domain
templates.cypher: MATCH (d:Domain) WHERE d.domain_id = $domain OR d.domain_name CONTAINS $domain MATCH path=(d)-[:HAS_CLUSTER]->(cc:ConceptCluster)-[:GROUPS]->(c:Concept) RETURN path LIMIT 150

templates.name: Thinking lenses for $cluster
templates.cypher: MATCH (cc:ConceptCluster) WHERE cc.name CONTAINS $cluster OR cc.cluster_id = $cluster MATCH path=(cc)-[r:APPLIES_LENS]->(tl:ThinkingLens) RETURN path LIMIT 50

templates.name: Content vehicles for $domain
templates.cypher: MATCH (d:Domain) WHERE d.domain_name CONTAINS $domain OR d.domain_id = $domain MATCH path=(d)-[:HAS_VEHICLE]->(cv:ContentVehicle)-[:DELIVERS]->(c:Concept) RETURN path LIMIT 150

templates.name: EYFS to KS1 progression
templates.cypher: MATCH path=(c1:Concept)-[:PREREQUISITE_OF]->(c2:Concept) WHERE c1.concept_id =~ '(CL|PSED|PD|LIT|EYMA|UW|EAD)-R-.*' RETURN path LIMIT 100

templates.name: Cluster sequence for $domain
templates.cypher: MATCH (d:Domain) WHERE d.domain_id = $domain MATCH path=(d)-[:HAS_CLUSTER]->(cc:ConceptCluster) OPTIONAL MATCH seq=(cc)-[:SEQUENCED_AFTER]->(cc2:ConceptCluster) RETURN path, seq LIMIT 100

templates.name: All thinking lenses
templates.cypher: MATCH (tl:ThinkingLens) RETURN tl LIMIT 20

templates.name: Difficulty levels for $concept
templates.cypher: MATCH (c:Concept) WHERE c.concept_id = $concept OR c.concept_name CONTAINS $concept MATCH path=(c)-[:HAS_DIFFICULTY_LEVEL]->(dl:DifficultyLevel) RETURN path ORDER BY dl.level_number LIMIT 20

templates.name: Y3 Maths difficulty map
templates.cypher: MATCH path=(c:Concept)-[:HAS_DIFFICULTY_LEVEL]->(dl:DifficultyLevel) WHERE c.concept_id STARTS WITH 'MA-Y3-' RETURN path LIMIT 300
